Construct the query part of the URL for a call to the US Census API

api_query.Rd

Construct the query part of the URL for a call to the US Census API

Usage

api_query(variables, for_geo, for_items, ..., use_key = TRUE)

Arguments

variables

a vector of variable names, like "B01001_001E"

for_geo

the geographical level the data will describe, e.g. "tract"

for_items

the specific instances of for_geo desired, e.g. "*" or "000200"

...

<dynamic dots> other items to pass to the query

use_key

optional, should the query include a Census API key from the system environment. Defaults to TRUE

Value

a string with the query part of a Census API call

Examples

api_query(paste0("B25003_00", 1:3, "E"),
                 "tract",
                 "*",
                 state = 55L,
                 county = 101L,
                 use_key = FALSE)
#> B25003_001E,B25003_002E,B25003_003E&for=tract:*&in=state:55&in=county:101

api_query(paste0("P1_00", c(1, 3, 4), "N"),
                 "block%20group",
                 "*",
                 state = 55L,
                 county = 101L,
                 use_key = FALSE)
#> P1_001N,P1_003N,P1_004N&for=block%20group:*&in=state:55&in=county:101
